de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.agdxml

Class AgdxmlParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.samdev.absgdx.framework.menu.agdxml.AgdxmlParser

  • public class AgdxmlParser
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to parse an AGDXML file for the AGDXML Layer class Use the parse() method to create an layout and the update() method to update an layout (e.g. after an resize)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      AgdxmlParser(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle agdxmlFile, AgdxmlLayer layer, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,GUITextureProvider> map_provider, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[]> map_imagetextures)
      Create an new AGDXML parser
      AgdxmlParser(java.lang.String agdxmlFileContent, AgdxmlLayer layer, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,GUITextureProvider> map_provider, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[]> map_imagetextures)
      Create an new AGDXML parser

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      AgdxmlLayerBoundaryElement getBoundaryRootElement()
      get the boundary root element of the boundary tree in this all relative size information are stores
      void parse(MenuFrame root)
      Parses the AGDXML file and creates the layout which it defines
      void update()
      Updates the layout (only call this after an layout was creates with parse() ) Call this for example after an resize

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgdxmlParser

        public AgdxmlParser(com.badlogic.gdx.files.FileHandle agdxmlFile,
            AgdxmlLayer layer,
            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,GUITextureProvider> map_provider,
            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[]> map_imagetextures)
             throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Create an new AGDXML parser
        Parameters:
        agdxmlFile - the file handle to the AGDXML file
        layer - the layer for the new layout
        map_provider - the map of used Texture Providers
        map_imagetextures - the map of used Image-Texture Providers
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if the AGDXML file cannot be opened or is not well formed

      • AgdxmlParser

        public AgdxmlParser(java.lang.String agdxmlFileContent,
            AgdxmlLayer layer,
            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,GUITextureProvider> map_provider,
            java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.TextureRegion[]> map_imagetextures)
             throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Create an new AGDXML parser
        Parameters:
        agdxmlFileContent - the content of the AGDXML file
        layer - the layer for the new layout
        map_provider - the map of used Texture Providers
        map_imagetextures - the map of used Image-Texture Providers
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if the AGDXML file content is not well formed

    • Method Detail

      • parse

        public void parse(MenuFrame root)
           throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Parses the AGDXML file and creates the layout which it defines
        Parameters:
        root - the root element on which we create our layout
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if there are errors in the AGDXML file

      • update

        public void update()
            throws AgdxmlParsingException
        Updates the layout (only call this after an layout was creates with parse() ) Call this for example after an resize
        Throws:
        AgdxmlParsingException - if there are errors in the AGDXML file (should almost never happen - because the file was already parsed once)

      • getBoundaryRootElement

        public AgdxmlLayerBoundaryElement getBoundaryRootElement()
        get the boundary root element of the boundary tree in this all relative size information are stores
        Returns:
        the root element
